english.segment1: True love, talkin' bout true love. Gotta have real love. Whatcha gonna do?. True love
english.segment2: Love don't hate, love don't play those games with your mind. Love forgives, true love lives forever and all time. I'll never treat you like a stranger, turn my back in times of danger. Love don't act that way, I said love don't act that way
english.segment3: True love, talkin' bout true love. Gotta have real love. Whatcha gonna do?. True love
english.segment4: Love is patient, love is kind, love won't let you down. It won't deceive, love will never keep the past around. Never worries, never lies no. Never leaves you, never dies. Love don't act that way. I said love don't act that way
english.segment5: True love, talkin' bout true love. Gotta have real love. Whatcha gonna do?. True love
english.segment6: True love, talkin' bout true love. Gotta have God's love. Whatcha gonna do?. True love. (chorus repeated)
